comment.author: 39191857@N05
comment._content: Excellent image of an office/sales environment in days gone by.  The ladies at work in their print dresses, the wooden chairs, desks and in/out boxes, the samples on display about the place, the old light fittings (I remember those in shops years ago) and the implements on the walls.  Very modern and businesslike.  I love the cushion under the lady nearest the camera, a hard seat needs to be softened up a bit!

comment.author: 63844591@N04
comment._content: These offices still exist at 26 O'Connell Street, Waterford

comment.author: 47290943@N03
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/63844591@N04] That's great to know! Have amended the description above...
